name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 6 Expert 2
description:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 6 Expert 2 is a video game for the Game Boy Advance, released in Japan on December 20, 2001. A modified version was later released under the title Yu-Gi-Oh! Worldwide Edition: Stairway to the Destined Duel.

Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters 6 Expert 2 is set during the Battle City arc. The player duels characters from the anime and manga. The player can participate in a few tournaments and duel single opponents they come across on the map screen. Cards are awarded for various reasons including defeating opponents, winning tournaments and free cards with the Duelist Weekly magazine.

name: Super Smash Bros. for Nintendo 3DS: King K. Rool Hat + King K. Rool Outfit
description: Has your Mii always dreamed of being king of the Kremlings from the Donkey Kong series? Sure they have - now they can realise their true destiny with this King K. Rool costume!

name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U: King K. Rool Hat + King K. Rool Outfit

name: Antonball
description:
Underground ping pong with an athletic twist!

After a long night on the town, Anton's struggling to find his way back home. You'll have to help Anton out by using your balls to break the bricks!

You'll also run into pesky Ballbusters during your adventure together. Get rid of them by smacking them with your balls, or hitting them from behind!

name: Wallace & Gromit DVD Game
description:
Join Wallace & Gromit and the characters from their feature film, in the duo's first ever Interactive DVD Game!

In this fun-packed two-team game, players travel around an animated virtual game board, propelled by the Spin-A-Tron: a Wallace-built contraption that takes the place of traditional dice - never before seen on DVD!

name: Shining Stars 4: Another Dimensional Incident
description: Shining Stars 4: Another Dimensional Incident is a light kaizo mod continuing, and ending, the story line of SM64 Shining Stars. Star Whomp and Celestial Bowser team up to cause all kinds of alternate dimensional chaos with the 152nd Star Comet, and we must stop them!

name: Rhythm Heaven Re-Megamix
description: Rhythm Heaven Re-Megamix is a full, CTGP-style sequel/refresh of Rhythm Heaven Megamix, featuring custom games, custom remixes, ported games from across the series, completely new games, and more.

name: Moritaka Chisato Safari Tokyo
description: Moritaka Chisato Safari Tokyo puts the popular actress and song writer Chisato Moritaka in a fantasy safari park set in Tokyo where the player can play different mini games (like listen and then choose which is the song that sounds, ride an animal, music mini games, etc.) or edit different live video clip of live shows of Moritaka Chisato.

name: Misa no Mahou Monogatari
description: Misa no Mahou Monogatari - Heartful Memories tells the story of a creature that got the mission from the queen of a magic world called Firimu, of travel to the human world and find a young girl to train her and make her become a tarot magician and that way she will be the champion that will defeat the evil powers that wants to conquer the human and the magical worlds. The game's story takes place in that high school and lasts for four years of training (in a Japanese high school from third grade to sixth), the main character of the game is Misa and during that time period she will have to train her abilities, meet different people and classmates, and face enemies in the human world. The gameplay is a mix between an adventure game and a simulation game, the player character will got better or worse stats depending of the training done each week, and her relations with other characters will also be different depending of the choices in the conversations.

name: Pinball Power
description:
Medieval pinball action with lots of tables and lots of power-ups.

Work your way through the dark ages, win battles and complete quests using just your pinball skills. Collect new power-ups and weapons as you go

Features:

First person perspective.
2D graphics
Cartoon graphics
Medieval Fantasy theme.

name: Castle Duels
description: Merge units, crush enemies, and dominate in PvP battles!

name: Pokémon Pisces Version
description:
A completely new sequel to Pokemon Emerald with 200+ new Pokemon. We hope you enjoy all of the new footage and look forwards to the romhack releasing by the end of the year.

As featured in F3 2024!

name: Annalynn '16
description: Annalynn is back at it once again! As her day at work in the mines is about to come to a close, Annalynn discovers a hidden crevasse from an otherwise well-known cave. With the allure of adventure too strong to resist, she crawls through the narrow passageway and discovers an underground utopia of many treasures, but also many dangers! Now, in hot pursuit by the Venom Brigade (Randy, Handy, Candy, and Mike) and their unexpected arachnid ally (Gil), Annalynn must defend herself with the mystical Blinding Rubies as she explores this mysterious cave for its many riches!

name: Paper Mario: TTYD - Tower of Trials
description:
Tower of Trials is a mod of Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door created by jdaster64 which pits Mario and his partners against a Rogue-like series of random battles, with a choice of different rewards after clearing each floor.

The mod also reworks a number of existing moves and badges, adds multiple new moves to each partner's moveset, and has an expanded Journal menu with logs for achievements completed, and moves, items and badges encountered.

name: The Super Mario Bros. Movie Game
description: Experience and play through the highest grossing animated movie of 2023 in an all new epic way through an action packed retro story driven 2D Platformer!

A tutorial app that lets you experience the trading card game "Digimon Card Game" to be released in 2020! Enjoy Digimon Card Game on your smartphone or tablet! Learn how to play Digimon Card Game! Equipped with "Tutorial Mode" to understand the basic rules and "Free Battle Mode" to actually play! Play with 3 different start decks!
You can enjoy a free battle using the half deck of the 3 start deck! Experience the fun of Digimon Card Game with Digimon Teaching App!

name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time - Crystal Clocks
description:
Take aim with the Dragshot, a modified slingshot with a creeping twist. Complete 11 different puzzle rooms as you manage platform switches and crystal activation sequences. Puzzles are primarily time-based, so having a good handle on aiming and being able to maintain patience is key. Estimated completion time is one hour.

Looking for an extra challenge? Scattered around the level are four optional Pieces of Hearts. Stay alert for a special hint system that will help you find them all. Although custom music was originally planned and arranged, I was not able to get it working for this release. Listen to it here: • Trailer Theme - The Legend of Zelda: ...

This mod was originally submitted as an entry for Hylian Modding’s first competition. This update adds additional puzzles, new collectibles, new rooms like an ending room, a visual overhaul, various bug fixes, and several quality of life changes.

name: OnlineCTR
description:
Naughty Dog developed and released one of the greatest arcade racers for the PlayStation 1 known as Crash Team Racing (CTR) in 1999.

We spent years disassembling the original Naughty Dog assembly/machine code back to C and managed to make it playable online without harming the original gameplay. We also added some new exciting features along the way.

The result is the original CTR game we know and love but finally available to be played with up to 8 players with anyone in the world... online.

name: The Bard's Tale: Remastered and Resnarkled
description: Bundle that includes The Bard's Tale: Remastered and Resnarkled and the original classic trilogy!

name: I Love Me, I Love Me Not
description: Play this game every time you need to remind yourself that you love who you are.

name: Nitro Express
description: Nitro Express is a 2D side-view gun action game with pixel-art graphics. The game utilizes a 360° free aiming system. You play as a member of the "Atypical Vehicle Disposal Squad" division of the Nitro City police force, tasked with destroying a variety autonomous mechanical drones known as "Companions," which have gone rogue and are wreaking havoc throughout the city.

name: Triple Tournament
description:
Collection of three games:
- cowboy duel game
- space racer
- shoot 'em up in which you try to prevent Kamikaze fighters to crash into your ship

name: Pokémon Anniversary Crystal
description:
Pokemon Anniversary Crystal is an extensive ROM hack created for the second anniversary of the Twitch Plays Pokemon stream.

It contains a new storyline combining parts of Pokemon Red and Pokemon Crystal, with some new elements. The post-game Kanto portion of the original Crystal has been greatly expanded with new quests. The player is able to catch all 251 Pokemon as well.

The gameplay has also been revamped with elements from later games as well. Physical/Special damage split (with new moves from newer games), Fairy Type, Move Re-Learner, EXP for catching have been included. Original game bugs have been fixed, such as with specialty Poke balls.

Of note is that the game optionally includes an “Advanced AI” hack. However, this will require a special emulator setup to install, as it allows an external script to analyze the player and enemy data to pick smarter moves for the AI. As RHDN does not permit emulator-specific hacks, that variation of the patch will need to be download at the authors’ site, / . The standard version of the hack, which uses the original AI, can be applied and run in any emulator.

name: Electric Dreams

Collect Sony goodies for extra points. You cannot move through the silicone chips. Use the arrow keys to control Mr. Strings

name: Bed Bounce
description: Help Mr. Strings bounce off his bed and collect his hi-tech state-of-the-art gadgets

name: Doom + Doom II
description: Developed by id Software, and originally released in 1993, DOOM pioneered and popularized the first-person shooter, setting a standard for all FPS games. The critically acclaimed sequel, DOOM II, followed in 1994. Now the definitive, newly enhanced versions of DOOM + DOOM II are available as a combined product.

name: Fairy Tail: Beach Volleyball Havoc
description: The cast of Fairy Tail is ready to bring mayhem to the summertime beaches! Unleash over-the-top magic to BLAST that volleyball!

name: Resident Evil: Survivor Redux
description: "Resident Evil: Survivor Redux" is a mod that introduces the traditional fixed camera from the classic Resident Evils into Resident Evil: Survivor, replacing its first-person camera.

The circus is in town! Step up and try your luck!

Take aim with the cannon, gun, or balls in each challenging event!

Smash those coconuts and take home a victory!

Can you beat the fair?

name: Bobby Six Seven
description:
The evil Zorbass, who is more of a fish than a man, has changed all the traffic lights in the town to GREEN! Traffic is bonkers. The chief of police is not happy about it.

You are detective Bobby Six Seven, and you need to fix the situation!

Using a time portal that some kid left in the police station, chase Zorbass through time and arrest that fish! The fate of traffic flow depends on you.

name: Sky Airplane Racer: Flight & Fight Simulator
description: Welcome to the exciting world of air plane racing, where speed and strategy are everything!

name: New Campaign Trail
description: New Campaign Trail is an expanded version of Campaign Trail by Dan Bryan, now with mod support and added scenarios.

name: CH Retro Episode
description: The summer of 2001 brought you CH Retro. A level filled to the rim with all that good John Romero episode 1 stuff we all know and love!

name: Deadly Standards
description: A community made Episode 1 replacement for Ultimate Doom. The only limit given was to use the stock IWAD resources (graphics, sounds). The exception being a new midi/soundtrack.

name: Deadly Standards 2
description: A community made Episode 2 replacement for Ultimate Doom, sequel of the Deadly Standards. Again, the only limitation is to create a map for Doom using only the stock assets (graphics, sounds, etc.), with the only expection of new midi soundtrack.

name: Doom
description:
The demons came and the marines died...except one. You are the last defense against Hell. Prepare for the most intense battle you’ve ever faced. Experience the complete, original version of the game released in 1993, now with all official content and Episode IV: Thy Flesh Consumed.

A remaster of Doom made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult, Improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: Tremor: Part I - Genesis
description: Tremor is a medium-sized techbase map, fairly open-plan but cramped in some areas.

name: Deadly Standards 3
description: A community made Episode 3 replacement for Ultimate Doom, sequel of the highly acclaimed Deadly Standards episodes. This time things gets a little change from the previous two installments with a new sky, a black void patch, a reskin of the original monsters and a theme of a frightening horrors that are hiding in the depths of a mysterious void world....

name: Doom II
description:
Hell has invaded Earth, and to save it, you must battle mightier demons with even more powerful weapons. This beloved sequel to the groundbreaking Doom (1993) introduced players to the brutal Super Shotgun, the infamous Icon of Sin boss, and more intense FPS action.

A remaster of Doom II made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult (which includes new recordings), Improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: Deadly Standards 4
description: A community made Episode 4 replacement for Ultimate Doom, sequel of the highly acclaimed and cacoward runner-up Deadly Standards episodic series. This time the classic stock assets theme got a rough deviation to more new assets, taken mostly from Alpha Doom and Romero dump of unused assets, as well as some other sources like Doomer Boards: Earth Ends and Ghostbusters Doom. Fight a terrifying world of a hell (on Earth?) that you never experienced before! Behold, the horrors of bureaucracy in a corporate world where anonymous towns are dominated by brutalism!

name: Phobos Revisited
description: Phobos Revisited is a nine-level episode replacement for The Ultimate Doom, created by Rex Claussen and released on September 10, 2004. It replaces the entire first episode and its levels are re-imagined versions of the original levels. Notably, all the levels remain (mostly) faithful to the geometry and pathing of the original levels.

name: Misao: 2024 HD Remaster
description: Misao: Definitive Edition was released back in October 2017, and now it's about to be updated to Misao - 2024 HD Remaster at midnight on August 15, 2024! Misao - 2024 HD Remaster doesn't only add HD graphics and update the overall presentation, but also adds new features that make exploring stages all the more enjoyable, giving the game a new playfeel.

name: Temple of Chaos 2: Warped Reality
description: Temple of Chaos 2 - Warped Reality is a single-level PWAD for Doom II with the ZDoom source port. It was designed by Melissa McGee (Agent Spork) and uses their own music track, "Nocturnal Bise".

name: TNT: Evilution
description:
The UAC relocated their experiments to one of the moons of Jupiter. A spaceship, mistaken for a supply vessel, was granted access. But when it got close to the base, demons poured out. All your comrades were slaughtered or zombified. This time it's not about survival. It's about revenge.

A remaster of TNT: Evilution made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult, improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: The Plutonia Experiment
description:
Every effort has been made by the nation's top scientists to close the seven interdimensional Gates of Hell, but one portal remains open. Alone, you must infiltrate the ravaged base, defeat the demon Gatekeeper, and seal the last Hell portal before the undead take over the world.

A remaster of The Plutonia Experiment made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult, improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: Master Levels for Doom II
description: A remastered version of the Master Levels for Doom II made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult, improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: Sigil
description:
Created by id Software co-founder, John Romero, and released as an episode-sized mod consisting of 18 new maps, Sigil fits in between the timelines of Doom (1993) and Doom II. Baphomet, the gatekeeper of Hell, “glitched the final teleporter with his hidden sigil, whose eldritch power brings you to even darker shores of Hell. You fight through this stygian pocket of evil to confront the ultimate harbingers of Satan, then finally return to become Earth’s savior.”

A remastered version made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult, improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: Clock Out At 2
description: Clock Out at 2 is a roguelite visual novel in which you have to survive inside the corporate machine known as the "workplace". Eat fast food. Drink lots of espressos. Experience microaggressions. Pray they don't fire you.

name: Paper Minecraft
description: An adventure game that brings the legendary Minecraft into a 2D world. Choose your character and preferred game mode to jump into the fun! This Scratch game features the classic survival and creative modes from the original Minecraft game.

name: Untitled RPG from WolfEye Studios
description:
This new project is a first-person action RPG that's set in an alternate America in the 1900s. It comes from WolfEye Studios, whose debut title was 2022's "Weird West."

When speaking on the inspiration of the game, studio co-founder Raphael Colantonio had this to say, "If there is such a thing as a continuum between Fallout and Dishonored, I would say Prey is somewhere in the middle because it's already more RPG than Dishonored, and this new game is somewhere closer to Fallout, as far as the RPG-ness goes." The game will be set near or in the Colorado area and conjure a "steampunk 1900s" aesthetic rather than pull from traditional Western tropes.

name: I Am Giraffe
description:
In a sunny merry meadow village, where a herd of giraffes live in peace and innocuously enough. something unusual has happened...a giraffe was born mutant.

He goes on the process of evolution, in his very peculiar way, by knocking out other giraffe brothers and “absorbing” them.

name: Stick Blender
description: Fling and grind your enemies to a pulp! Capture enemies and toss them into your blender. Fill your blender up and buy upgrades to make your blender unstoppable!

name: Big-Time Butter Baron
description: A.P. Butterworth runs the most successful butter factory in the world, but he can't remain the biggest of the Big-Time Butter Barons without the right staff! Clock in at the butter factory and slot together those butter shapes ready for delivery in this creamily-smooth puzzler!

name: No Rest for the Living
description: A remastered version of the No Rest for the Living made in the KEX Engine, community-published mod support, original midi soundtrack or the modern IDKFA version by Andrew Hulshult, improved performance with multithreaded rendering, BOOM source compatibility, accessibility options and translated into eight new languages.

name: Super Antonio
description: Super Antonio is a difficult 3D platformer with satisfying movement. Climb to the top while enduring a punishing experience.

name: Cupig's Key Collectathon
description: Cupig's Key Collectathon is a little puzzle game where a pig collects keys to open treasure chests. Levels have increasingly difficult solutions. The game measures speed per level bases, the player should get high scores in time.

name: Wuhu Island Explorer
description: Roam around freely in Wuhu Island without any restrictions.

name: Dastardly & Muttley: Operation - Pigeon Pursuit
description: Sin descripción

name: Dweebers
description: So what if you've got a Styrofoam face? Hey, it's a dweeb world out there! Dweebers knows that. That's why we've given your hero a steam iron face, grasshopper legs, and little booties that look like Volkswagons. Think that's outrageous? Wait till you meet up with your fish larvae enemies! Come on. What are you waiting for? Be a dweeb!

name: Late Homework
description: Retrieve your forgotten class assignments from school while avoiding the creature known to haunt it at night.

name: Idle Dyson Swarm
description: Manage a solar empire, produce bots which will make solar panels for you. Send your panels to the sun to generate energy and sell that energy to make money which you can spend on even more bots!

name: Bang Bang Barrage
description: Survive the treacherous sea in this quirky top-down roguelike shooter! Play solo or team up and fight off Cthulhu's minions. Master a unique recoil-based mechanic to blast enemies and chart your course. Mix and match upgrades to craft the perfect sea-surviving strategy!

name: Five Years Old Memories
description: This is an interactive omnibus animation based on interviews with my friends about their memories around the age of five, based on their personal sensory memories and episodes.

name: Mesmerizer
description: This is fan-made game of "Mesmerizer," a vocaloid song! The battle system is based on the Undertale-like battle system.

name: Seaflower
description: Seaflower is a short sapphic visual novel about a selkie who washes up on a remote scottish island and her friend, a total selkie chaser.

name: Mestroids
description: Maneuver through the onslaught of asteroids plummeting toward your ship in hopes to eventually return home in one piece. Collect and spend coins to obtain gear to aid you on your travels through space.

name: Damn Dog
description: Guess what WikiHow article an illustration belongs to

name: Verses of Hope
description: Verses of Hope is a 2D platform game and interactive poetry adventure where you shape the world through the power of your words. Build your own poems to change the landscape and narrative.

name: Sages of Vandaleria: Rebirth of an Empire
description: Vandaleria. A fallen empire. Since the ruling house was overthrown, it has known only misery and hardship. What it needs is a savior. Embark on an epic RPG adventure, fighting across land and sky, restoring the ancient religion, and retake your birthright! That is, if you are ready to pay the price.

name: Forknite
description:
Minnie's been served up a plate of vile veg and she needs your help to eat them and defeat them!

So do you reckon you're up to the challenge? If the answer's yes, then what are you waiting for? Oh, you probably want to know how to play!

Well, don't worry, it's easy - just use Minnie's fork to clear the tray by using your finger (or mouse!) to connect groups of 3 veg or more before the timer runs out!

So if you fancy helping Minnie by munching some villainous veg, get ready, get set and get crunching!

name: Resident Evil: Wesker Rebirth
description: Experience the story of Albert Wesker as he fights his way out of the Arklay Research Facility and Spencer Mansion to escape before the entire complex self destructs in this exciting mod that takes place moments after the original game!

name: Clover's Space Beat
description: Clover’s Space Beat is a gay lewd rhythm space shooter game in which you take control of Clover in his quest to stop Doctor Deadbeat. You’ll get help from Miller, the engineer and mothership pilot and the Colonel of the Dance Federation.

name: Snazzy and Groovy in Crystal Town
description: Snazzy and Groovy in Crystal Town is a bite sized, story-focused RPG surrounding two cat friends and their relaxing holiday in a place called Crystal Town. However, something sinister brews beneath the surface... will you give the people of crystal town a hand? Or give them the cold shoulder...

name: Energy Lab
description:
ENERGY LAB!
In 30 episodes, can you escape this lab?
You can trigger the mechanisms with your energy orb,
Remember that some things need to be triggered if you want to get through!
Only this energy orb will not trigger anything!

name: Maximum Entertainment RPG Bundle
description:

Balls near the disappeared ball will be surprised and stretch left and right, creating an unexpected chain reaction.

Platform your way through the ruins of the Pizzaplex, go through familiar areas in a completely new way and take on old foes and other wacky shenanigans in this crazy quest for freedom!

description: Follow the game instructions exactly as they are written. They won't lead you astray... or will they? Find a way to avoid the red lava and reach the other side of the screen. If you touch it you have to start over from the beginning.

name: Of Ash and Dust

name: Search Dungeon Master
description: Search Dungeon Master is an exciting hidden object puzzle game set in a medieval dungeon setting. This game is a great way to relax after a hard day and get away from problems.

name: Forest God
description: Forest God is a psychological horror game from the first person. The investigation of Agent X of the secret service turns into an endless journey deep into the universe, filled with abnormal incidents, the nature of which is previously unknown to anyone.

name: The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 2
description:
The Legend of Dark Witch 2 for Nintendo Switch retains its simple controls and enough challenges to satisfy the completist.

Created by indie games company INSIDE SYSTEM in 2014, The Legend of Dark Witch 2 is a 2D action story sequel to "The Legend of Dark Witch". True to its predecessor, Legend of the Dark Witch 2 retains its simple controls and enough challenges to satisfy the completist.

Players have 8 stages to choose from and must use SHOTs to make their way through a variety of obstacles to reach the boss enemy. Within each

New to the Remake:
- New Stages
- Returning characters from the Prequel
- Refreshed Artwork
& more!

name: The Legend of Dark Witch 4
description: Revealed at Tokyo Game Show 2024, "The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 4: Delivering Feelings is coming soon.

name: Funeral Song for the Elemental Lords
description:
"Though I am bound by chains, my soul is free.
I'm the only one who can save myself."

A free exploration platformer for Web & Windows, by Sylvie & Aria. Fairly difficult and around 3-5 hours long.

name: Yokubou Lock: Boku no Kanojo wa Shasei Kanrinin
description:
The main character, Tsukasa, confesses his feelings to Tsubomi, the girl he fell in love with at first sight. Surprisingly, the answer was OK. Tsukasa was happy to have found the lover of his dreams, but...

Tsubomi is such an incredibly caring person. And I'm grateful, but... things just keep escalating and she keeps craving my semen.

name: Blocus
description:
Blocus is a Breakout variant with bright neon graphics. The gameplay builds on the classic formula of controlling a paddle near the bottom of the screen to bounce a ball and remove bricks from the field, but it adds some new elements. There are two types of paddles and they are divided into three parts. When the ball hits one of the paddle's three sections, it becomes warmer and when it is hot, bullets are shot automatically, destroying the bricks above. Particles have physics and will collide with the paddle or the walls. The player is rewarded for clearing columns and that increases the speed of the ball.

The game can be played in an endless mode or in a set of procedurally generated levels where the difficulty level is gradually increased. Destroyed bricks often leave behind power-ups such as additional balls or explosions. Diamonds can be collected as a currency to upgrade the paddle multiple times, improving the fire power. The game is free-to-play with an in-app purchase to remove the advertisements.

name: M.E.S.S.
description:
M.E.S.S. stands for Mega Endless Space Shooter.

Just like its name, the game is an old school themed Shoot 'em up where you command a battleship and declare war to the rest of the universe.

This game is a casual and competitive shooter where you earn upgrades and can keep it for the next session.

name: Falskaar
description:
A DLC sized new lands mod that adds 20+ hours of fully voiced lore friendly (But not canon) quests, dungeons, and more.

For hundreds of years Falskaar has been inhabited by the Nords, though most of its history from before then is unknown.

For the first time since the party's arrival in Falskaar almost 600 years ago a portal activates deep within the ruins of Mzubthand and the player steps through, arriving in Falskaar. They are denoted 'The Traveler', based on an old prophecy.

"They who arrive through the shimmering wall mark the start of the worst."

name: Wyrmstooth
description:
The East Empire Company commissions the Dragonborn to slay a dragon that is interrupting trade routes throughout Skyrim. But is the dragon stirring up trouble with a particular reason and what sinister motive does it have for its actions?

Wyrmstooth adds a new quest that takes the Dragonborn to the island of Wyrmstooth situated north of Solitude across the Sea of Ghosts. Battle across new landscapes and through new dungeons in this expansion-sized mod. The task may seem simple enough: slay a dragon that's stirring up trouble. But things never quite go that easily...

name: The Shiny Show
description:
Look at the pictures & answer as many questions as you can!

For every answer you get right, give yourself a shiny!

name: Sqube Escape
description: A unique action-platformer game set in the Sqube universe. Challenge yourself through 60 levels filled with obstacles and bosses. Choose from four difficulty levels and enjoy immersive graphics and sound.

name: Kids' WB Turkey Day Food Fling
description: Use your mouse to click on the monsters as they pop up, be careful not to fling anything at the good guys!

name: Feed the Cat
description: When the girl she's dating needs an emergency cat sitter, Claire jumps to volunteer. After all, what could go wrong with pet sitting an adorable little cat for one night? (A short horror visual novel.)

name: Phoenotopia
description:
A mysterious force abducts the peaceful villagers of Panselo. As Gale, loyal denizen and survivor of the incident, set out to solve this mystery and rescue your friends!

Adventure, fight, and puzzle solve your way through the world of Phoenotopia!

name: Mystical Crash in Magical Middle Ages: Adventure of Valkyrie
description:
A guy named Dimon, the main character of this game, inexplicably got into the magical Middle Ages and was forced to disguise himself as a valkyrie - a warrior girl Diana). What awaits him, will he be able to understand what happened, return home or stay in the magical world. Is he still he, or maybe she, or something else?

What adventures are waiting for the character? All or almost all actions and their consequences depend on the player.

name: Ao Oni X
description:
"There is a sealed tunnel deep in the mountains. Beyond it lies an abandoned village, one from which visitors never return."

After hearing this mysterious urban legend, our protagonists decided to visit an abandoned village on their vacation to test their courage. To their surprise, they find that the village isn't abandoned at all. In fact, it seems quite ordinary...

name: Mighty Math: Calculating Crew
description: An edutainment game involving four superheroes and four games, each involving math.

name: PS!Outertale
description: Project Spacetime, or PS!Outertale for short, is a take on Outertale by Mimi Pippinski (2mi127). It is set on a space station (the Outpost) which the monsters were banished to after their home planet was destroyed.

name: Compare the Meerkat
description:
Internet toy made to tie in with a comedic marketing campaign, where Russian meerkats would complain about being confused for the subject of the campaign, Compare the Market - a price comparison site, in contrast to their business of contrasting meerkats against one another.

UK version was delisted long ago, and is non-functional on WayBack Machine, but the game remains on the Australian site.

name: MOTAS: Magnum Opus - The Alchemist's Shadow
description:
A rogue-like deckbuilder potion crafting sim, currently in early Alpha.

Build your deck progressively from prima material into tinctures (and stones TBA) to win battles and solve puzzles as you travel through your master’s dungeons and tower. You are a Master alchemists assistant, a homunculus crafted from the bones of a small rodent and shadow alchemy. However, something has gone terribly wrong, and the tower has fallen into disarray. Set things aright with guidance from another homoculus trapped in a flask, battling other homoculi, rival alchemists, and gain esoteric knowledge of your craft through sigils along the way.

name: Hokuto no Ken: Shin Seikimatsu Kyuuseishu Densetsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Doraemon Tanoshii Enseikatsu Youchien Hoikuen
description: Doraemon Tanoshii Enseikatsu Youchien Hoikuen is a Doraemon game released for the Advanced Pico Beena.

name: Fragmented Almanac
description:
Embark on an enigmatic odyssey through time and space in Fragmented Almanac, a mesmerizing narrative puzzle game redefining retro gaming on the SEGA Dreamcast.

You will embark on a journey through a complex timeline, exploring The Hideout—a repository of alchemical knowledge, ancient tales, and mystical symbols. As a trapped spirit seeking to reunite with its original body, you will unravel the mysteries of this enigmatic realm.

Additionally, players will delve into the alternate universe of Summoning Signals, assuming the role of The Pilot aboard the Sprinter-2 ship, which has crash-landed on an Unknown Planet. Amidst a blend of futuristic technology and ancient ruins, players must navigate the labyrinthine landscapes, repairing their ship and unraveling the secrets of this strange world.

At the junction of video games, new media art and alchemy, this project is the culmination of 7 years of Dreamcast development, spread over 5 different games. Fragmented Almanac is a short but dense experience and offers a modern twist on retro gaming, combining nostalgic aesthetics with innovative gameplay.

Are you ready to uncover the fragments and embark on an enigmatic journey shrouded in mystery?

name: Mighty Math Zoo Zillions
description: Mighty Math Zoo Zillions teaches kindergarten, 1st, and 2nd grade students the concepts, facts, and thinking skills necessary to build math confidence and develop a strong, lasting understanding of math! Innovative activities teach number line concepts, addition and subtraction, counting money and making change, problem-solving skills, and early three-dimensional geometry. Learning and understanding math is fun with the entertaining creatures of Zoo Zillions!

name: Crayola Paint 'n Play Pony
description:
Create and Care for the Virtual Pony, Horse or Unicorn of Your Dreams! (Ages 5 - 10)
Learn all about horses as you color, decorate, and dress their own horses, ponies, or unicorns!
Tons of Creative Activities: Color with 48 Crayola colors.
Decorate with pretty accessories such as flowers and bows. Dress your pony in over 100 fashions.
Learn fun facts about horses and ponies!

name: Where in the U.S.A. Is Carmen Sandiego?
description: The remake version of Where in the U.S.A. Is Carmen Sandiego? was released in 1996 by Windows and Macintosh and features Lynne Thigpen playing "The Chief" from the World game show. The game's opening credits finds Carmen Sandiego arriving in her underground V.I.L.E. outpost in Washington, D.C., as she and RoboCrook plan to steal America's greatest treasure from each of the 50 states. Carmen later contacts each of her 39 V.I.L.E. operatives telling them to begin their missions.

name: Hot Wheels: Custom Car Designer
description:
Mattel Media's Hot Wheels Custom Car Designer CD-ROM puts you or your child behind the virtual wrench, spray brush and stamp pad, allowing you to customize the appearance of 20 different traditional Hot Wheels models (including the jeep, speedboat, blimp and a number of racers). But why stop at detailing your dream machine when you can also draft licenses and traffic tickets, label trophies and ribbons, and create flags and license plates?

From the main access screen, you can visit the Print Shop to create a newsletter, greeting cards, business cards, letterhead, and postcards; the DMV to make licenses and license plates and issue tickets; Victory Lane for ribbons, trophies, banners, and flags; and the Customizing Garage where you customize your cars.

The customization features include choosing the colors for your car from eight available, placing decals and adding different styles of tires, muffler pipes, spoilers, and weapons. Licenses, ribbons, and trophies can be personalized including imported photos for licenses. Also, traffic tickets can be created using traditional violations or personalized to include "special violations," such as "Dad didn't take me to the movies...$20 fine." Everything you create can be saved and printed.

Hot Wheels Custom Car Designer CD-ROM sports a basic point-and-click interface and has no demanding PC requirements. Anyone familiar with MS Paint will be able to make use of the variety of creativity applications. Geared towards children, the product includes voice-recorded online help and links to the Hot Wheels Web site. No longer must you pine over your inability to tweak, tune or trick out your own car or truck; Hot Wheels Custom Car Designer CD-ROM puts all the tools at your disposal for making your souped-up fantasy car into a (virtual) reality.

name: Reader Rabbit Math Adventures Ages 4-6
description: Spend a day at the park where math is your ticket to thrilling rides and fun–filled games! Join Reader Rabbit and friends as they hop along from the arcade to the roller coaster, using numbers to solve puzzles and win great prizes. Even pre-readers can play independently!

name: Japaritale
description: Welcome to JAPARITALE, a crossover fan-game between the 2017 anime "Kemono Friends" and the hit RPG "UNDERTALE". One day, a human named KABAN, a long-lost child of the Park, randomly shows up in the Savannah Area. Fallen by a few vines on her path, she realizes the importance of dangers set afoot in this foreign land.

name: Lost Resolve

name: FrogFlop
description: In Floppy's Great Leap, you play as Floppy the frog, aiming to reach the highest peak. Jump and climb through challenging levels in this 2D pixel art adventure. Reach the summit to make your wish, but be careful—one wrong move and you could find yourself back at the bottom!

name: Craz'D: 13th Anniversary Edition
description:
The 13th anniversary edition adds balance changes, improved boss battles, bugfixes, quality-of-life features, support for more operating systems, mail nerds and also egg.

The changes are designed to improve the flow of the gameplay while altering the experience as little as possible.

Longtime fan, friend, and mentor the Oddwarg created this version of the game.

name: Raid Arena
description: Raid Arena is a real-time team-based top-down tactical shooter. The game incorporates new mechanics, fresh concepts & graphics, as well as a focus on community to help provide an entertaining experience for everyone.

name: Coagulation Station
description:
COAGULATION STATION is a short atmospheric horror game that blends cosmic horror with dark absurdist humor. Maintain a malfunctioning blood rig located deep within the universe's only 'Living Planet' and experience the horrors that lurk within.

In an attempt to pay off your debt to the Grand Galactic Bank, you stumble upon an opening for a job on Carrion Prime, a living world that is famous for it's blood based foods. Your job is to look after one of the various blood rigs that supply the surface with 'Product'. But beware, the pipes tend to suck up all manner of things in addition to blood. Worryingly, there is a rumor going around about the existence of "something big" lurking within the throbbing depths below...

Will you survive to pay off your debt or become another "workplace accident" for the company to downplay?

name: Tower of Nod
description:
Tower of Nod is an action-roguelike deckbuilding platformer with unique sleep-based controls. You are a Hero that can masterfully manipulate the falling Blocks and build a path upwards... but only while you're asleep! Move quickly and confidently to avoid the blocks above and lava below.

Build a deck of pieces at your disposal to aid your journey upwards and grant you temporary boosts. Pair them with powerful relics to create unique synergies. Climb higher and higher while managing your sleeping state to stay out of danger!

name: Fortnite: Chapter 5 - Season 4: Absolute Doom
description:
Suit up for Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 5 Season 4: Absolute Doom and become a Marvel legend -

Become the heroes first on the scene to defend against Marvel’s Doctor Doom and his forces or take up the mantle of villainy and join the reign of Doom. Luckily, there's some brand new heavy munitions to take on a worthy adversary. Go head-to-head with new items like Dual Micro SMGs, Captain America’s Shield, or War Machine’s Arsenal.

A special demo released originally only via codes previous the release of Pokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire.
It was the only way to obtain some special items in the full game such as megaevolution stones.

The demo had an original story that differs from the full games' one.

name: Pokémon Sun and Moon Special Demo Version

It was settled in Hau'oli city and was the only way to obtain some special items and Pokémon, such as a Greninja capable of changing into Ash Greninja.

name: SlowAndSteady.io

Multi Zero Player Idle Game.
Race other players around the globe in real-time for as long as you can to climb the leader board without actually doing anything!

The longer your tortoise races, the higher your rank goes up. All you have to do is leave the game open in the background.

name: Louie's Mansion
description:
Louie wins a free mansion, AND IT'S FULL OF FREE FOOD?!
Help the President save Olimar and his debt from the wicked ghost!
Will Louie Survive the Horrific Ghouls?! (Probably, it's Louie we're talking about)

What Is Louie's Mansion?

An overhaul of Luigi's Mansion to replace everything Super Mario related with Pikmin.
That means, every ghost, treasure, characters, all Pikmin!!

description: Your mission is to exterminate the enemy forces within the Fabrika Mortis space station.

Seismic Ventures is a singleplayer & co-op episode inspired by the original Quake game.
It has 8 mainline maps and 1 secret map.

name: Centaurus
description: A medium sized base map made with the progs dump devkit.

name: Let's Go Read: An Ocean Adventure
description: Robby Raccoon and Emily Squirrel are on a mission to find the missing book mobile under the ocean. Along the way they find lots of things to do. At Pier City there is a stingray that paints long and short vowels. Kids hear the sounds vowels make and then hear words and sentences that use the sounds. Young readers then use what they learned to deliver mail. The postcards and packages have vowel sounds and words. At the Powerstation kids put letters together to sound-out words. This is a great phonics activity. Kids hear all the letters sounded out as they form words. Children also blend bubbles to make words with consonant blends, find words with a target blend or digraph sound and find books under the sea. Once children find storybooks they can hear them read aloud or record themselves reading the story and play it back. Kids will love playing these activities and parents will agree for learning phonics the Let's Go Read series is remarkable.

name: Richard Scarry’s Busytown: Best Math Ever

name: The Liminal Dimension
description: You're trapped in an endless loop within a liminal dimension, where each loop leads to increasingly unsettling places. Will you find the way out of this psychological horror? The game offers a unique déjà vu experience that blurs the lines between reality and illusion.

name: Secrets of the Dark: Eclipse Mountain
description: Save your friend from the Demon of Darkness in Secrets of the Dark: Eclipse Mountain! Follow clues left by stone monks in a deserted town in Thailand to uncover a thrilling mystery. Battle the dark and magical werecreatures that want to sacrifice your friend in this macabre hidden object puzzle adventure game!

name: Muerto de Risa
description:
Alberto López Felisberto is a normal young man with a problem... Not being able to stop laughing at the most inopportune moments. Today, the event is his grandfather's funeral.

Alberto will have the difficult task of holding back his laughter in the face of the constant absurd situations that his family will present to him. Follow him as he descends into madness in this visual novel about an absurd funeral, mourning a grandfather, and the problem of not being able to laugh in inappropriate situations.

name: Goofy's Silly Slide
description: Look what Goofy did to the Clubhouse slide! I don't know how he did it, but it sure looks like fun!

name: Boxcar Brats
description: Boxcar Brats is a wacky, top-down, multiplayer, "anti-racing" game. Your box car is out of control, so do everything you can do stay in last place! Swerve, skid and smash everything in sight to build up your brake meter and spin out your opponents! So hop into your boxcar, cause some mayhem and eliminate your buddies - nothing is off limits when you're a brat!
