description: Explore the mysterious open world of the Chornobyl Exclusion Zone in this post-apocalyptic action RPG adventure. Craft your story by facing sinister hazards and monsters. Survive furious encounters with the help of your crafted weaponry, developed skills, gathered teammates, and supported factions

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 5
description: Put your hands together for the next Festival Icon! Fresh off her historic stadium world tour, award winner and pop culture powerhouse Karol G brings her Latin sounds to the world of Fortnite in Festival Season 5.

name: Fountaintale
description: FOUNTAINTALE is a fan-made sequel to UNDERTALE, inspired by elements from it and DELTARUNE as well, adapting both games into a fresh and new experience.

name: Fountaintale: Chapter 1
description: One year after the events of UNDERTALE, Monsterkind has been adapting to their new lives on the Surface. The game begins on a very special day, Frisk's Birthday! After a very fun party night with their friends and family, Frisk is ready to end the day, though fate still had a gift of their own to give...

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Extended Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Outbreak: Detective Collection
description: Lost alone in a zombie infested mansion in the woods...

name: My Lovely Series
description: What would you do to save your loved ones? Befriend, nurture, and murder new companions and lovers alike to gain mastery over the most sinister magics and mend your broken heart!

name: Puzzle Master: The Ultimate Challenge of Wits
description: Puzzle Master: Unleash Your Genius, Piece by Piece!

name: World War II: Airplanes Battle
description: Conquer the Skies, Change History.

name: Donkey Kong Country 3: Ascension
description: Sin descripción

name: Charisma
description: Impress a recording studio in order to escape.

name: The Guardian Shift
description: The Guardian Shift is a whimsical adventure about a young guardian, awakened from slumber, who faces a series of perilous trials to fulfill their destiny of safeguarding the planet. Despite the daunting challenges, the guardian must rise to the occasion and protect the world. Go forth, Guardian.

name: Roadies: Unsung Heroes
description: Fast Paced Roadie "Simulator"

name: Gunzle
description: Gunzle is a game made in 3 days for the Nonejam 9. In the game you control Clover and you have to use your gun to pass trought the levels and reach the stars. As the game jam theme was genre mix the game is a mix of Gun and Puzzle.

name: Neptune
description: The first of PLANETARIA series.

name: Whatever We Decide to Call this Game
description: Whatever We Decide to Call this Game is a text adventure game in which one finds themselves outside the doors of their new college with three tasks to accomplish - find a bathroom, enroll in classes, and get a parking sticker.

name: Cargo Hunters
description: A third person shooter and extraction looter shooter which involves robots trying to survive rather than humans. A PVE and PVP shooter game with looting mechanism to build/craft gears in your Outpost. Gears and items can also be sold or bought from the market in your Outpost.

name: Uranus
description: The second of PLANETARIA series.

name: Halo Infinite: Operation Fleetcom
description:
This content update brings a bunch of additions and improvements to the game, including the return of two beloved modes from Halo 3 and Halo: Reach, a veritable swath of enhancements to Forge, major sandbox changes, a free new Operation Pass, and more.

The free cosmetic "operation pass" which launched aside this update ran from July 30, 2024 to September 3, 2024. It was made available in perpetuity to those who purchased the pass.

name: Auto Hustle
description: Auto Hustle was a sandbox-style free roam game. They follow the adventures of a choosable unnamed Protagonist and their path to taking over the city.

name: BCBasic
description: Help the caveman reach his beloved by crossing a territory full of dangers. Run on the wheel, jump and duck to avoid obstacles, such as holes, branches, rocks, etc. that will present themselves along the way.

name: 80's BASIC Games
description:
These are C64 BASIC games the developer wrote as a teenager in the 1980's. They're slow, glitchy, and barely playable.

BOUNCY BALL
"My first attempt at what could be called a game. Uses joystick in port 2. Try to place blocks in the ball's path to score points."

LOST MAZE
"Text adventure/maze game. Complete."

AMAZING MAZE
"Graphical maze game, player controls animated sprite character. Uses joystick in port 2. Mostly complete."

CHOPPER RAID
"Unfinished horizontally scrolling shooter, similar to Activision's Chopper Attack."

D&D
"Simple dungeon crawler, uses custom characters. Uses joystick in port 2. Load & run "D&D", then follow the prompts. Complete."

DEFLECTION
"Breakout-style game. Uses joystick in port 2. Complete."

PLANET DEFENDER
"Invaders from space are attacking the planet. If they blast a hole in the ground, patch it by moving your ship over the hole. Uses joystick in port 2. Complete."

name: Penguin: Sokoban Adventure
description:
Help the Penguin collect all the bones and find the way to the igloo.

Penguin: Sokoban Adventure is a puzzle game for the NES. The game was created using Retro Puzzle Maker.

The game contains 64 levels of varying difficulty.

name: Mummy: Egyptian Puzzle
description:
Help the Mummy collect all the keys of life (Ankh). Find the way to the Underworld.

Mummy: Egyptian Puzzle is a puzzle game for the NES. The game was created using Retro Puzzle Maker.

The game contains 40 levels of varying difficulty.

name: Mystery Trackers: Darkwater Bay
description:
Elephant Games presents the latest exhilarating installment of the Mystery Trackers series!

When a renowned scientist goes missing from the Poseidon research vessel, you're sent to investigate. You quickly uncover that there's much more to this expedition than simple research. A powerful and dangerous artifact awaits beneath the waves, and the Mystery Trackers aren't the only ones after it! Can you uncover the artifact's history and keep it from falling into the wrong hands? Find out in this thrilling hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

name: 2048 Advance
description: A homebrew port of 2048 to GBA and Web Browser.

name: Save: Teaser - Before the Dawn
description:
Save Teaser: Before the Dawn

"SAVE Teaser" is a first-person survival psychological horror teaser game set just before a nightmarish search mission in ‘SAVE’. Players take on the role of a protagonist trapped on the 6,000-ton ship 'SENARA,' which is sinking due to mysterious phenomena. Experience the desperate escape process in this hyper-realistic real-life 6,000-ton ship 'SENARA,' and immerse yourself in a hauntingly realistic atmosphere of mystery and horror.

name: Magical Boco
description:
When you hit a star on an enemy, a fruit will appear. If you take a fruit, you get a score.
When you touch an enemy, your POWER will decrease.
When the power reaches 0, the game is over.

name: Alien Attack
description: A shoot'em up that was published as a listing in MSX Computer Magazine #7, March 1986 on page 73.

name: Copper Jacket
description: Alert! Your former boss -- Commander Zaslavsky -- has kidnapped your wife-to-be in an attempt to make you do his dirty work. Your mission is to defeat this sinister commander and rescue the love of your life. Your best mate, Anatoly, has agreed to help you on your mission. You may really need his help as the journey will be rife with many challenges and obstacles to overcome. Zaslavsky has many men under his command as well as many war machines at his disposal. You must navigate through his defenses to reach his command center that rests atop a snowy mountain – it is here in which your beloved one is being held hostage. In addition to overseeing a powerful army, Zaslavsky is rather manipulative, so you should be cautious if he tries to communicate with you on your radio. Blast your way through 13 levels and 5 bosses in this brand-new, action-packed, 1-2 player NES game!

name: Saturn
description: The 3rd of PLANETARIA series.

name: Jupiter
description: The 4th of PLANETARIA series.

name: Pikmin Maps in Minecraft
description: Sin descripción

name: TrotMania: Aeternum Obscurum
description: TrotMania: Aeternum Obscurum is the third entry of the TrotMania series. It is primarily based around the fourth season of My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic.

name: TrotMania IV: Euphorius
description: TrotMania IV: Euphorius is an unofficial My Little Pony rhythm game and the fourth entry in the TrotMania series. The game is focused on adding songs from the fifth and sixth seasons of the show, alongside various fan songs, putting over 100+ songs in this installment.

name: Hexcodle
description: A Wordle clone game with hex codes. Challenge your color instincts and decode the hexcode.

name: Godforged: Origins of Ozgalor
description: Godforged: Origins of Ozgalor is a story-rich, single-player Action RPG set in the world of Nelethar. Experience tactical combat, class blending, and kingdom ruling in a world besieged by a god, where your actions and choices shape the future of Ozgalor.

name: Prop Hunt
description: Prop Hunt is a modded gamemode for Garry's Mod. The game plays like hide and seek with 2 teams, the props and the hunters. The props are given 30 seconds to find a hiding spot before every round and the hunters have to find and kill them within the given time limit.

name: Dottie Dreads Nought
description:
Dottie Dreads Nought is a platforming game created for the SNESDEV Game Jam 2021.

Can you help Dottie on her hiking adventure to find the legendary Edelweiß flower?

Along for the ride is her friend Ernesto. By using the magic mirror, you can shift perspective to him and reveal secrets previously hidden.

name: Fiddlebert's Folly
description: Sin descripción

name: Pack not Found 404
description: Sin descripción

name: Portal: Google Translate Edition
description: This mod seeks to take the text, dialogue, and developer commentary of Portal, put it through varying amounts of languages in Google Translate, then put it back into English.

name: The Dreamers Foresight
description: Embark on a dreamlike journey as a ninja in this roguelite adventure, shaping your world with randomized biome tiles, align similar Tiles for better loot. Build a powerful deck from a variety set of cards while balancing your energy to battle relentless nightmare creatures.

name: Project: G-216
description: Project: G-216 is a Horror themed Observation Game, where you monitor the CCTV feed of a cursed place to check it for supernatural annomalies.

name: Portal 2: Google Translate Edition
description: As with previous works from BinkusTheTrinkus such as Half-Life: Google Translate Edition and Portal: Google Translate Edition, Portal 2: GTE aims to take all of the dialogue, text, and developer commentary of Portal 2, put it through several different languages in Google Translate, then put back into English. This fills the base game with a bunch of garbled nonsense that makes it nearly unrecognizable.

name: Monster Hunter: Poogie Race
description: Race your poogie to the finish line.

name: Cho Chabudai Gaeshi! 2
description: A sequel to Cho Chabudai Gaeshi, which again sees the player flipping a table.

name: Pikmin 3 DX: Caves Reborn
description: Sin descripción

name: The Wanted Man's House
description:
In "The Wanted Man's House," plunge into the shadows of a slasher suspense, inspired by iconic horror films from the '80s and '90s. Take on the role of Mason, a daring adventurer in pursuit of fame, determined to break into the infamous residence of the sought-after killer known as "Baby Face."

The story unfolds as Mason, armed with courage and a camera, discovers that the location of the house has been inadvertently revealed by his own friends. His goal? Record every chilling moment to expose the terror in the city's newspaper. However, things take an unexpected turn when Baby Face returns home. Are you ready to face the nightmare?

name: Daemon Bride: Additional Gain
description: Daemon Bride: Additional Gain is an updated version of the 2009 Examu game, Daemon Bride, a game about people that have made contracts with demons or angels. The game features some of the traditional angel/demon contractor staples, such as a boy with a succubus and alluring female with a magic snake, but also some more oddball and unorthodox characters, like a gang member with an angry squid attached to his arm, and a dog with a bird form of Satan that follows him around. The cast is very balanced and a lot of fun to play with given their unique designs, tools, and play styles.

name: Umblight
description: Umblight is a deckbuilder roguelite where you must combine cards to overpower your opponents. Travel through dark environments, find treasure, build your special deck filled with unique skills, and battle the creatures you meet along the way in this DND inspired adventure!

name: My First Date RPG: Oriana - Story Two
description: Sin descripción

name: RetroRealms: Halloween
description: Step into the RetroRealms, a 16-bit Pixel Art world, and take control of classic horror icon Michael Myers! Fight your way across multiple levels of platformer action filled with sights and sounds inspired by the original Halloween film. Slice your way through Haddonfield, face-off in epic Boss battles against familiar faces from the movie, and overcome blood-soaked challenges in this intense retro throwback to classic arcade action!

name: RetroRealms: Ash vs. Evil Dead
description: Step into the shoes of Ash Williams from the Starz television series Ash vs Evil Dead in a horrifying new Pixel Art platformer! Wielding both his trusty chainsaw and 12-guage shotgun, play as Ash and battle Deadite hordes across multiple levels of 16-bit gameplay filled with enemies from the Ash vs Evil Dead series. Journey into the Dark Realm to overcome additional challenges and save humanity from the Necronomicon in this groovy throwback to classic arcade action.

name: Rex! Your Interactive Pet Dinosaur
description:
Dinosaurs aren't extinct. They can live, play and grow on your computer.

Nuture and care for Rex as you guide him through complete life-stages of infancy, adolescence and adulthood.

Teach Rex to play fetch, color cave paintings, sing, dance and more.

Explore 6 unique environments with Rex incuding caves, forests, deserts and more.

Watch as Rex grows and develops a unique personaility. Your interaction with Rex influences how he will behave and respond.

Own up to 5 different dinosaur pets - each with their own unique personality.

name: Fortress
description:
Me and my friends used to play a game called 'fortress'.

Fortress is a game made for GameMakerItalia Terroroctober jam. The jam theme was "Cut"!

name: Tasogare
description: Tasogare is an adult visual novel developed by Leaf and was originally released for PC on February 02, 2001.

name: Hot Wheels Monster Trucks: Stunt Mayhem
description: Packed with epic stunts and your fan-favorite monster trucks in action! You can smash, crash, and perform mind-blowing tricks across fantastical arenas in this adrenaline-fueled arcade adventure!

name: Xplode Man
description: Sin descripción

name: Dormant
description: The game's story is about the mental torture of an individual who lived in a hostile and isolated environment. Little issues with no way to vent build up until the victim lashes out.

name: ViperTen16
description:
The goal of this game to control a snake to move and collect food (the numbers from 1 to 9) in the screen map. If you collect all the 9 numbers, you win and the game is over. If you try to move the snake with a movement contrary to its movement (eg move it to the right while it is going to the left), you lose and the game is over.

In the same place where a number is eaten, an obstacle is left. If the snake touch one of the obstacles or the edges of the screen, the game is over. To start the game again just write RUN and press RETURN.

name: Squirm 16
description: Sin descripción

name: Pac 16
description: A Pac-Man clone that was originally sent for a type-in publication in 64er magazine, but got refused.

name: Jinja
description:
The missile is approaching the Shinto shrine.
Please intercept it.

name: Escape from Island
description:
The plane broke down.
Escape from uninhabited island.

name: Awesome Tanks
description: Prepare to unleash a war! Smash enemy tanks, destroy bosses, find secret rooms full of bonuses. Collect coins to upgrade your tank's stats, purchase and improve weapons!

name: Intruder
description:
Welcome to the neighborhood! You started working from home and bought a new house, far from the city.

But something seems off about it. Just be cautious, and don't believe in fairytales.

name: Qui Veut Gagner Des Millions
description: Qui Veut Gagner Des Millions is a mobile game based on the French version of Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? for iOS.

developers.name: Sony Pictures Television UK Rights Limited

name: Awesome Tanks 2
description: Defeat enemy tanks, collect coins, and destroy the enemy base in order to clear each level. Spend your money wisely to upgrade your tank with better armor, weapons, visibility, and more.

name: Shattered Dreams
description: Sin descripción

name: Real Life Day: Threesome
description: "Real Life Day: Threesome" is designed for those who appreciate deep, realistic, and emotional stories. The game is perfect for fans of visual novels who are interested in relationships, life wisdom, and intimate moments.

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Isekai Chronicles - DLC 1
description: Sin descripción

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Isekai Chronicles - DLC 2
description: Sin descripción

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Isekai Chronicles - DLC 3
description: This DLC includes a new Scenario, Character, Subquests, and Building Types content. Players can campaign through the Additional Scenario: Martial Arts Tournament, where they can liven up the party with the Additional Character, Milim. The game also features Additional Subquests, such as Valentines Day, Blumund Cooking Contest, Prepackaged Curry, and Beer. Additionally, players can sharpen Tempest with the inclusion of new Additional Building Types, including an Edgy Liquor Store, Edgy Tool Shop, Baron Goblin, Edgy Apartment Complex, and Edgy Armory.

name: Fashion Friends: Super Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Parking Masters: Bus Driver
description: Sin descripción

name: Thief Puzzle: Tricks
description:
Take on new challenges and become a master trickster!
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- 260 new levels for you to face!
- 13 cool skins for your hand!
- 6 colorful themes for a fresh look!

Equip new skins and trick others with style!

name: Thief Puzzle: Pranks
description:
Take on new challenges and become a master prankster!
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- 260 new levels for you to face!
- 13 cool skins for your hand!
- 6 colorful themes for a fresh look!

name: Arderico's Journey
description: Arderico's Journey is an interactive fiction adventure that draws inspiration from the fascinating realms of fantasy tabletop RPGs and classic gamebooks, enriched with dynamic character interactions, meaningful choices, and content that reacts to your decisions.

name: Climbing with Silly Cat
description: Fun and difficult game about climbing with cute silly cat that rotate a lot! With 10 unlockable skins Game includes cute cat pictures! And you can meow!!!

name: Frog World
description: Venture into the depths of the Swamp as an adorable frog! Grapple, swing, jump, and swim to complete a secret quest in this short side scrolling adventure.

name: Pixeplorer
description: Explore an infinite amount of pixelated worlds in this adventure sandbox game, and find villages, enemy camps, and quests along your journey!

name: Tetris Crush
description: A game of Tetris played with guns.

name: Organ Game: Merge Puzzle
description: When you hit the same organ, the organ will “evolve”! Evolve organs more and more to get bigger organs! The goal of the game is to get a high score so that the organs do not overflow from the beaker. Aim for the first place in the score ranking!

name: Erogoddess: Asgard
description: Erogoddess: Asgard is a dating simulator with feminized Norse gods. Odin, Loki, Thor and other gods are waiting for you. Discover new gods by spinning the wheel of fortune and go on dates with them, liberating them and undressing them. Add new goddesses to the gallery until you undress them all!

name: Raccoon on a Boat
description: Get unforgettable photos at the ultimate eco-learning park, Raccoons on a Boat. A boat ride at night is always fun.

name: Sticky Business: Camp Zinnias
description: With a vibe that mixes the energy of Camp Rock with the tenderness of Heartstopper, Sticky Business: Camp Zinnias is a lighthearted yet profound coming-of-age tale.

name: Dying Noise
description: Soramimi-Inspired Walking Horror GameDecipher the voices. Your survival depends on your ability to listen.

name: Escape from Octlien
description: Escape from spaceship

name: Get Down
description: Get Down to the deepest point, to this Game's Creator, to RESET his gone wrong game world and save its NPCs. WHY YOU? Because only the file called Player can execute the reset button. BUT NOTE: If you fall, there's no saving.

name: Daydream Mosaics 5: Crimson Veil
description: Rejoin Juliette and her companions in their quest to find Raven. Solve intricate nonograms, unlock mini-games, rebuild ancient sanctuaries, and lift the sinister curse that has befallen the Crimson World.

name: Land of Mushrooms
description: Dive into the Land of Mushrooms , where enchanting fungi come to life! Combine a delightful array of mushrooms, from the elegant Parasol to the flavorful Chanterelle, as you skillfully drop them into the pot.

name: Forget
description: Immerse yourself in a living nightmare where every dark corner of the apartment hides terrifying secrets. Wake up without memories, Pursued by an enigmatic presence, and discover the truth about a missing child. Reality or illusion? It's up to you to unravel the inexplicable.

name: Lord's Journey
description: The Lord's journey is a strategy-based large-army auto chess game, the great demon lord fell in love with the human princess at first sight, but the evil prince kidnapped the lord's beloved. In order to save the princess, the lord embarked on an expedition!

name: Match
description: MATCH is a minimalist, arcade-style score-attack game that puts the focus on player skill. Memorize, flip, and match cards as you progress through levels, each with a shorter time limit. Compare your high-scores with friends' in the variety of game modes to see who is the MATCH Master!

name: PokerBall
description: An all new block-based puzzle game, using Poker rules!

name: Goblin Quest: Remake
description: Goblin Quest:Remake is a ground up rebuild of our nonlinear fantasy game Goblin Quest. From playing the hero who saves the lands to the villain who destroys it, the world will adapt and respond to your actions. You decide your fate.

name: MoonBeam
description: This game is a shooting game where players are positioned at fixed shooting spots aiming to defeat waves of monsters and score points.

name: Girls on Campus, from Freshmen to Faculty, All Fall for Me!
description: In this exciting love interaction game, players act as a photography-loving sophomore who, after being knocked out during a shoot, finds themselves entangled in various indescribable scenarios with female seniors, juniors, and a married teacher!

name: Dog vs Cat Othello
description: Cute Growth-Based OthelloA growth-based Othello game featuring cute dog and cat characters. Flip your opponent's character and evolve my character into stronger one! Playable in both single-player and local two-player modes.

name: Comet Alpha Rescue
description: Comet Alpha Rescue is a sci-fi 2.5D real-time action/RPG game made in a retro, cartoon style art with comic book-style storytelling, customisable combat abilities allowing for various play styles, detailed character development and progression and interaction with the environment as you explore.

name: Imitation
description: Join the experiment! Imitation is a brain-teasing guessing game. It pits humans against AI. Given a set of questions, players must choose if the answer was provided by a human or generated by an AI. Can you tell the difference between human and AI?

name: Crazy Taxi M-12
description:
Try to clear the course as fast as you can! Drive the crazy taxi down the course and score points by crashing into the cars with the correct number on them.

Each course will give you a number that determines which cars to hit. You can only score when you crash into a car that is a multiple of the given number. Each course looks for multiples of different numbers, so you’ll want to study up on your times tables!

name: Dr Dokkoy
description:
I escaped from the spaceship and returned to the earth.
Apparently, some experiments seem to have been done here.

name: The World's Easyest Game
description: A funny and easy online quiz game that’s sure to make you laugh! Come and relive your childhood with this classic silly game that really is just as easy as it seems. You’ll also enjoy the upbeat music and colorful layout. This is one quiz you don’t have to sweat about failing.

name: Bubble Bobble
description: Based on the Sega Master System version, this version crunches down the level sizes in order to work on the Game Gear's weaker screen resolution.

name: The Idiot Test
description: A funny quiz game that will test your knowledge on nothing and everything. The idiot test is smarter than you. The idiot test has been around a long time and it has been played millions of times. This is not your normal quiz game, this is not a normal free trivia game on the internet. This is the Idiot test, a game which has ruled the destiny of many a player long before you!

name: Nyan Cat FLY!
description: Guide Nyan Cat through the galaxy in his never-ending quest for YUMMIES! Eat yummies! Avoid veggies! Get a high score! Customize your Nyan Cat!

name: Balls of Life
description: Take your journey from cradle to grave in the happiest of all possible forms: a smiling yellow ball! Get a job, pay taxes. Pay taxes and get a job. Vote. Serve on a jury. Does it sound like fun yet? Did we mention paying taxes?

name: Stickman Badminton
description: Badminton is pretty cool if you're not playing it while sporting knee socks and braces. Play as a fleshy human or state of the art robot and make a racket!

name: Ruins of Pantheon
description:
Octlien come the earth again so that they begin the final attack.
Please search for treasure that sleeps in ruins, and defend the earth.

name: Connect Four
description: Connect Four is the strategy game that we all know and love. You play against a computer opponent in connecting, you guess it, 4 pieces before your opponent does. The pieces can be connected vertically, horizontally, and even diagonally. You have the option to play as red or yellow as well as choosing your difficulty level.

name: Sonic.2017
description: This is a playable Subterfuge game created by Romeo-Hosting, based on the short animation by Coda.

name: Kids Station: LEGO no Sekai
description:
Kids Station: Lego no Sekai is a Japan-exclusive educational game that uses an animal world made of Lego pieces to teach young kids about numbers, letters, shapes and other intellectual training mini games. The game uses different kind of animals like: panda, elephant, monkeys, pony, etc to explain and do each mini game.

This is one of the few Kids Station games that doesn't come with the Kids Station controller in any release.

name: Elevator Down
description: Judge the Fate of the Dead in this satirical, bureaucratic, decision-making game. Talk to Souls, check their documents, reference Holy Texts and decide if they're going Up or Down. Follow the Rules or trust your own moral compass and see where your choices take you - hopefully not the Elevator Down.

name: Avalanche Escape
description:
While resting in a mountain hut, you encounter an avalanche.
Escape from the hut!

name: Moe Waifu H Genius
description: Win the maidens’ hearts through mastery of rhythm and memory!

name: Apexaris Tower
description:
Climb your way up the dangerous Apexaris Technologies Tower for your only chance at a cure. Many have tried and failed, could you be the first?

Careful where you step you could possibly fall all the way back to the start! avoid the zappers in each section, they will zap you back to an unfortunate location.

Use your special high tech boots to traverse the tower with double jump/ Dash! combining those with upgrades like Hover, Triple Jump, and a Surprise!

Warning: Rage may follow

name: Snap Snap
description: SNAP SNAP is a first-person psychological horror game with an oppressive atmosphere and intense gameplay. Use your camera to escape the monster and solve some puzzles. Use the charge sparingly, as the battery may run out and while it is charging at the station... you are defenseless. The game has four endings. Will you be able to open them all? Beautiful graphics, oppressive atmosphere and high-quality sound will help you fully immerse yourself in the terrifying world of SNAP SNAP.

name: H2 Multiplayer Mod
description:
H2 Multiplayer Mod was a mod for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered (H1) that aimed to recreate the original Modern Warfare 2 Multiplayer experience with new twists. The mod featured a wide variety of maps, new progression, unique camos, remastered weapons, custom attachments, and more. The original MW2 killstreaks made a return as well, completely changing the way Modern Warfare Remastered feels and plays.

On August 15th, 2024, just one day before the mod was set to release, Activision Publishing, Inc. sent a cease-and-desist letter to the members of the H2M-Mod team, effectively rendering the mod defunct. While the mod team ceased all activity on the project, a playtester leaked a build of the mod, making it available to the public.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero - Limited Edition
description: The Limited Edition includes The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero - Deluxe Edition, "SSS Classified Files" Hardcover Art Book, "Anthems of Crossbell" Official Soundtrack (10 Select Tracks), "Special Support Section, Assemble!" Cloth Poster (17” x 24”), "Heroes of Zero" Acrylic Stand, Steelbook and Collector's Box.

name: Darkside Adventures: A Game with a Kitty 2
description: Sin descripción

name: H1-Mod
description:
H1-Mod is a modded client for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered. This client aims to provide a better-than-vanilla experience, with many quality-of-life features which are designed with gameplay enhancements in mind. The original game on Steam did not have a huge player base and is considered a forgotten Call of Duty. Also, the original game has so many game-breaking features that it is hard to play the original experience without facing a issue every so often.

With H1-Mod, new features include, but are not limited to: unlocked field of view adjustment, HUD safe area adjustment, detailed sensitivity adjustment, multiple fullbright modes, disabling of broken shader caching, unlocking all cosmetics, stat changing, uncapped max FPS, and a dedicated server browser.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails to Azure - Limited Edition
description: The Limited Edition includes The Legend of Heroes: Trails to Azure - Deluxe Edition, "Azure Archives" Hardcover Art Book, "Anthems of Crossbell Part II" Official Soundtrack (10 Select Tracks), "New Recruits" Acrylic Stand, SteelBook, "United as One" Cloth Poster (17" x 24") and Collector's Box.

name: A Game with a Kitty 3
description: Sin descripción

name: A Boney Night
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic: After the Sequel - Omega
description: Sonic: After the Sequel - Omega is fan-made enhanced version of Sonic: After the Sequel.

name: Sky Crashers
description: Sin descripción

name: Stargirl and the Thief from the Exploded Moon
description: Sin descripción

name: Animal Basket
description:
Animal Basket 2005 Sammy Corp.

Export release. Game developed in Japan.

name: AGwaK Adventures
description: Sin descripción

name: Herbert's Island Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: A Game with a Kitty 6: Moon Minion
description: Sin descripción

name: Ducky: The Brave
description: The journey of a pet duck 'Ducky'! Healing(Hard) game going up the river towards the top of the mountain.

name: Champion Baseball 2
description:
A one- or two-player baseball game. The umpire sounds really Japanese.

Champion Baseball 2 was produced by Sega in 1983.

Sega released 593 machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1960. Sega was based in United States.

Other machines made by Sega during the time period Champion Baseball 2 was produced include: Character Cabinets, Oh Shou Serizawa 8dan no Tsume-Shougi, Zoom 909, Zektor, Tac/Scan, Astron Belt, Champion Baseball, Champion Boxing, Commando (Sega), and Congo Bongo

name: Cloud 9
description:
Shoot clouds in the sky. Avoid rain drops and other enemies. Try to destroy all clouds before your chamber is flooded.

Cloud 9 was produced by Atari in 1983.

Atari released 137 machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1972. Atari was based in United States.

Other machines made by Atari during the time period Cloud 9 was produced include: Fast Freddie, Gravitar, Dig Dug, Black Widow, Akka Arrh, Alpha 1, Arabian, Cloak & Dagger, Crystal Castles, and Firebeast aka Dragon Master

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the Base Game, Premium Cosmetic Set and Starter Set DLCs.

name: Believer Clubhouse
description:
Enter a world of Chaos.
Play minigames themed around the content creator Astral Spiff.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Limited Edition
description: The Limited Edition includes The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Deluxe Edition, "Legends of Zemuria" Hardcover Art Book, "Songs of Reverie" Official Soundtrack, "Three & Nine: A Trails Tale" Softcover Novel, Steelbook, "The End and the Beginning" Acrylic Print and Collector's Box.

name: Scary Shadow Spot: Last Farewell
description: Scary Shadow Spot: Last Farewell - Haunted by his past, Mark explores a haunted house where nothing is as it seems. Chilling puzzles and shocking truths await. Are you ready to uncover the mystery hidden in the shadows?

name: Yowasugiru RPG
description: A freeware Japanese RPG Maker parody game about a weak hero tasked with saving the world from the evil demon king. The game is heavily comedy focused, where the jokes come from how useless the main character is. Part of KSB Games RPG Parody series.

name: Daemonologie
description: A remake of the short folk horror story about the Scottish witch trials in Unreal Engine 5. You play the role of a witchfinder. Speak to the locals and sort their truths from their lies. On the last morning a witch must hang, best you know who by then.

name: The Knightling
description: The Knightling is a platforming action adventure where you play as an aspiring knight in search of their missing mentor, Sir Lionstone. Equipped with only a legendary shield, you’ll brave your way through the lands of Clesseia to become the unlikely hero.

name: Barkour
description: Step into the paws of a brave, four-legged special agent! In BARKOUR, you work for a secret organization where all agents are exceptionally skilled animals brought together by one goal: to save the world from the forces of evil (and mischievous cats)!

name: Frenzies
description: Frenzies is the chaotic PvP shooter for the ultimate show-off, combining nDreams’ precision gunplay with a lucky dip of frantic round types. Make friendships and ruin them amid a hail of neon-soaked gunfire in a winner-takes-all arena showdown.

name: Experimental Penguins
description: Sin descripción

name: Meta Battler
description:
Meta Battler is a rogue like deck building game which utilises every NFT built on the Wax blockchain.
Meta Battler is free to play - battle through increasingly difficult towers to become the ultimate champion, power up your cards and decks and win unique collectible prizes along the way!

name: Project_Structure_01
description: Project_Structure_01 is first-person exploration game focusing on atmosphere and exploration of surreal liminal spaces that feature brutalist architecture.

name: Bio-Hazard
description: Sin descripción

name: Overwatch 2: Season 12 - New Frontiers
description: Blast into action with Juno, the new Martian support hero, an intense Clash game mode featuring two new maps, divine mythic skins, and more.

name: Two Point Museum
description: Curate and manage incredible museums! Explore to discover amazing artifacts. Design and refine the layout, keep staff happy, guests entertained, donations plentiful… and children off the exhibits.

name: Calamity
description:
Welcome to Calamity, a free-to-play action-RPG set in a vibrant 2D top-down world.
Inspired by legendary games such as World of Warcraft, Lineage, Diablo, and Albion Online, Calamity offers a rich and engaging experience where you can conquer challenging dungeons or battle against other players.

name: Silver Pines
description: Silver Pines is a survival horror metroidvania. Fight nightmarish terrors and solve puzzles, while carefully managing your scarce resources as you uncover the mysteries of a case that could hold the key to redemption.

name: Mushroom Season
description: Mushroom Season is a mushroom picking simulator! Customize your character and immerse yourself in the competitive world of mushroom picking. Explore rich forests filled with diverse mushrooms—some delicious, some deadly. Master the art of identification, tackle survival challenges, and engage in fun side quests. Drive vehicles to cover more ground and aim for the prestigious mushroom picking trophy. Ready to prove you're the best forager out there? Dive in and find out!

name: Pangea: Return to Planet Earth
description:
Pangea: Return To Planet Earth is sci-fi-pulp/space-opera-themed multiple-choice interactive fiction game presented as an interactive comic book. The game, self-described as adult in nature, is reminiscent of the Heavy Metal film and magazines.

The game was programmed in MMGRASP (MultiMedia GRaphic Animation System for Professionals). It was supposed to be the first episode in an ongoing series, but no subsequent episodes appear to have been released

name: Commando
description: Sin descripción

name: Douglas Circumstance
description: Sin descripción

name: Portal: A Computer Novel
description: Home, a biological computer. The final link to the past and the only conduit to the future. But Homer is dying and access grows weaker moment by moment. Will you discover where everyone has one or will the doorway to humanity close forever, leaving you totally alone?

name: The Freshman: Book 1
description: A romance story surrounding a young woman who attends a very prestigious college and encounters numerous challenges in life and love as she coasts her way through school.

name: The Freshman: Book 2
description:
The Freshman, Book 2 is the second book of The Freshman series.

In this book, your character starts the winter quarter of her freshman year at Hartfeld, as she deals with old problems, new projects, and her one true love...

name: The Freshman: Book 3
description: The Freshman, Book 3 is the third book of The Freshman series.

name: The Freshman: Book 4
description: The Freshman, Book 4 is the fourth and final book of The Freshman series.

name: The Sophomore: Book 1
description: A continuation of The Freshman, following the MC from that series as she enters her second year of college, facing yet more trials and tribulations in her life.

name: The Sophomore: Book 2
description: The Sophomore, Book 2 is the second and final book of The Sophomore series

name: The Junior
description: A continuation of The Sophomore, following the MC from that series as she enters her third year of college while dealing with a fraternity and a campus prankster with malicious intent.

name: Jack in the Box
description: Your son found an imaginary friend. But you have no idea what terrors are you about to witness...

name: The Senior
description: A continuation of The Junior, following the MC from that series as she enters her last year of college and looks on towards the future.

name: The Freshman: Love Bites
description: The Freshman: Love Bites is a Halloween special based on the characters of The Freshman.

name: The Freshman: Snowed In
description: The Freshman: Snowed In is a Christmas Special Book. This story takes place between The Freshman, Book 1 and Book 2.

name: The Freshman: Game of Love
description: The Freshman: Game of Love is a Valentine's Day Special Book. This story takes place before the events of Chapter 4 onwards of The Freshman, Book 2.

name: The Sophomore: Hartfeld Horror Story
description: The Sophomore: Hartfeld Horror Story is a Halloween-themed special book. The story takes place in The Sophomore, Book 1.
